>>>
= Abc

{doctitle} begins on a bleary Monday morning.

<<<

<div class="paragraph">
<p>Abc begins on a bleary Monday morning.</p>
</div>

>>> With meta

{doctitle} begins on a bleary Monday morning.

<<< With meta

</div>
